channel.title: [pi] Pk kills dont work erase characters memory [pi]

server.Server.main(Server.java:154)
[/code] Then when i look at character files its blank all the codes i have in is below
In player with all other ints [code] public int pkKills = 0; [/code] IN player assistant will player is killed [code] public void applyDead() { c.respawnTimer = 10; c.isDead = false; if(c.duelStatus != 6) { //c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId); c.killerId = findKiller(); Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId]; if(o != null) { if (c.killerId != c.playerId) o.sendMessage(""+c.playerName+" falls before your might."); if(!PlayerKilling.hostOnList(o, c.connectedFrom)) { PlayerKilling.addHostToList(o, c.connectedFrom); o.pcPoints +=1; o.pkKills +=1; o.getItems().addItem(995,500000); o.sendMessage("You now have [@red@"+o.pcPoints+"@bla@] PK Points kills! You also receive 500K coins."); o.sendMessage("You now have [@red@"+o.pkKills+"@bla@] PK kills!"); } else { o.sendMessage("You have recently defeated "+c.playerName+", so you don't receive any PK Points or
Kills."); } c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
c.playerKilled = c.playerId; [/code]
In player save [code] } else if (token.equals("pk-kills")) { p.pkKills = Integer.parseInt(token2); [/code] And in Player save again [code] characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("pk-kills = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.pkKills), 0, Integer.toString(p.pkKills).length()); [/code]

item.title: [pi] Pk kills dont work erase characters memory [pi]
item.dc:creator: @minikiller minikiller
item.description:
@minikiller wrote:

I Vain I:

characterfile.write("pk-kills = ", 0, 11);

Yep. The Number 11 is the LENGTH of pkKills (space counts).

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] Pk kills dont work erase characters memory [pi]

item.title: [pi] Pk kills dont work erase characters memory [pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

haha spent a week on this the time i put my code up i figure out i need to change 1 number im so stupidâ€¦

tyvm

Read full topic

In player with all other ints

	public int pkKills = 0;

IN player assistant will player is killed

	public void applyDead() {	
		c.respawnTimer = 10;
		c.isDead = false;
		if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
			//c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
			c.killerId = findKiller();
			Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
			if(o != null) {
				if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
					o.sendMessage(""+c.playerName+" falls before your might.");
if(!PlayerKilling.hostOnList(o, c.connectedFrom)) {
	PlayerKilling.addHostToList(o, c.connectedFrom);
	o.pcPoints +=1;
	o.pkKills +=1;	
	o.getItems().addItem(995,500000);
	o.sendMessage("You now have [@red@"+o.pcPoints+"@bla@] PK Points kills! You also receive 500K coins.");
	o.sendMessage("You now have [@red@"+o.pkKills+"@bla@] PK kills!");
} else {
	o.sendMessage("You have recently defeated "+c.playerName+", so you don't receive any PK Points or 

Kills.");
}
				c.playerKilled = c.playerId;							

c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
